verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> of the inheritance <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell in; <S%H3427><s%> and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> also unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for the cities <S%H5892><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them.

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall they have <S%H1961><s%> to dwell in; <S%H3427><s%> and the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of them shall be <S%H1961><s%> for their cattle, <S%H929><s%> and for their goods, <S%H7399><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> their beasts. <S%H2416><s%>

And the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> shall reach from the wall <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7023><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and outward <S%H2351><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And ye shall measure <S%H4058><s%> from without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on <S%H853><s%> the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be in the midst: <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> to them the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And among <S%H854><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> there shall be <S%H853><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for refuge, <S%H4733><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> that he may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> and to <S%H5921><s%> them ye shall add <S%H5414><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%> them shall ye give with <S%H854><s%> their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> shall be of the possession <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them that have many <S%H7227><s%> ye shall give many; <S%H7235><s%> but from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them that have few <S%H4592><s%> ye shall give few: <S%H4591><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> of his cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to <S%H6310><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he inheriteth. <S%H5157><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> be come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%>

Then ye shall appoint <S%H7136><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for you; that the slayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> which killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> at unawares. <S%H7684><s%>

And they shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto you cities <S%H5892><s%> for refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1350><s%> that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
And of these cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall ye have <S%H1961><s%> for refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

Ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> on this side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which shall be <S%H1961><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a refuge, <S%H4733><s%> both for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> and for the sojourner <S%H8453><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: that every one <S%H3605><s%> that killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unawares <S%H7684><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with an instrument <S%H3627><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> so that he die, <S%H4191><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with throwing <S%H3027><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> he may die, <S%H4191><s%> and he die, <S%H4191><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with a hand <S%H3027><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> he may die, <S%H4191><s%> and he die, <S%H4191><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

The revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> the murderer: <S%H7523><s%> when he meeteth <S%H6293><s%> him, he <S%H1931><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> him.
But if <S%H518><s%> he thrust <S%H1920><s%> him of hatred, <S%H8135><s%> or <S%H176><s%> hurl <S%H7993><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> him by laying of wait, <S%H6660><s%> that he die; <S%H4191><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> in enmity <S%H342><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> him with his hand, <S%H3027><s%> that he die: <S%H4191><s%> he that smote <S%H5221><s%> him shall surely be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> for he <S%H1931><s%> is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> the murderer, <S%H7523><s%> when he meeteth <S%H6293><s%> him.

But if <S%H518><s%> he thrust <S%H1920><s%> him suddenly <S%H6621><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> enmity, <S%H342><s%> or <S%H176><s%> have cast <S%H7993><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him any thing <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3627><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> laying of wait, <S%H6660><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> a man may die, <S%H4191><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> him not, <S%H3808><s%> and cast <S%H5307><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> him, that he die, <S%H4191><s%> and was not <S%H3808><s%> his enemy, <S%H341><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> his harm: <S%H7451><s%>

Then the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the slayer <S%H5221><s%> and the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> according to <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> judgments: <S%H4941><s%>

And the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall restore <S%H7725><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge, <S%H4733><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was fled: <S%H5127><s%> and he shall abide <S%H3427><s%> in it unto <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was anointed <S%H4886><s%> with the holy <S%H6944><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> shall at any time come without <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge, <S%H4733><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was fled; <S%H5127><s%>

And the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge, <S%H4733><s%> and the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> kill <S%H7523><s%> <S%H853><s%> the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> he shall not <S%H369><s%> be guilty of blood: <S%H1818><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he should have remained <S%H3427><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest: <S%H3548><s%> but after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession. <S%H272><s%>

So these <S%H428><s%> things shall be <S%H1961><s%> for a statute <S%H2708><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%> unto you throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

Whoso <S%H3605><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person, <S%H5315><s%> <S%H853><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall be put to death <S%H7523><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of witnesses: <S%H5707><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against any person <S%H5315><s%> to cause him to die. <S%H4191><s%>

Moreover ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> satisfaction <S%H3724><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of a murderer, <S%H7523><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is guilty <S%H7563><s%> of death: <S%H4191><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> he shall be surely put to death. <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> satisfaction <S%H3724><s%> for him that is fled <S%H5127><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge, <S%H4733><s%> that he should come again <S%H7725><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

So ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> pollute <S%H2610><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are: for <S%H3588><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> defileth <S%H2610><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be cleansed <S%H3722><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is shed <S%H8210><s%> therein, but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of him that shed <S%H8210><s%> it.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> therefore <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> shall inhabit, <S%H3427><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8432><s%> I <S%H589><s%> dwell: <S%H7931><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
